attributes.action: ensure all MP's repay their expenses that have been proved to be excessive/taking a total liberty of the taxpayers money
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hundreds of thousands of pounds have been claimed, whilst within the rules of parliament, are not within the rules of the everyday common person and as such should be repaid in full.  This will be the only way MP's can ever gain any respect from the general public again.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
